column1: Art Institute of Chicago////We get to one painting and I ask my friends ok what do you see.  They said
column4: and really boring stuff- I say ok now look at this again
column6: don't look at it as a landscape it is really impressionistic - it is satire
column8: look again so now do you see the naked man laying down- he is the whole painting.  And then They just all burst out in recognition.  Anyone in sight distance took off their phones and were just looking and trying to see why I was such a good docent and then they finally got it too after talking to my friends.  Case in pint- it is art to be looked at and connected with not just viewed and forgotten.
